snippet.title: Crazy Chicken X - PlayStation 4 Gameplay
snippet.description:
The chickens have escaped! They are everywhere, flapping around, running all over the farm and hiding. Open the hunting season and shoot the cheeky fowl to restore peace and order on the farm. Awesome 90-second rounds of shooting fun!

Moorhuhn / Crazy Chicken, Crazy Chicken X, Moorhuhn X (C) Markt+Technik Verlag GmbH / ak tronic Software & Services GmbH
Developed by Korion Interactive GmbH
Also released for Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 5

#playstation #moorhuhn #crazychicken #moorhuhnx #crazychickenx #ps4 #playstation4 #theforeseenarcade 

FUN FACT: Before the PS4 / PS5 version, Moorhuhn X was also ported to the PSone and PS2, both of which were PAL exclusive. As a matter of fact, the PSone port was one of the last commercially released games for the console in 2005.
